qas.question: When did the BeiDou system begin transitioning to global coverage?
How did the BeiDou system begin transitioning to global coverage?

answers.text: with the first launch of a new-generation of satellites

qas.question: During what year did the system begin transformation towards serving China only?
What did the system first launch in 2013?
In 2007, the system began transforming towards providing what type of coverage?
The system began its transition towards national coverage during which year?

context: In <a0_0><b2_0><b5_0>2015<b5_0/><b2_0/><a0_0/>, the system began its transition towards <b4_0>global<b4_0/> coverage <a1_0>with the first launch of a <b3_0>new-generation of satellites<b3_0/><a1_0/>, and the 17th one within the new system.
